page.title: 14School Yard Games .
page.content: One of the games we play at school is Hop-scotch.In this game a stone is thrown into a grid of 10 squares.You hop there to collect it then hop back. Stick in the mud is a game where one person is on,The others run away but if they are ticked they stand with arms out straight until someone runs under there arms.If you are ticked three times you must be the person on.Other games involving 'tick' are Rallyo and Off ground tick.In the Red Rover two teams stand opposite each other joining hands one team shouts 'Red Rover,Red Rover send Philip right over'.Philip must leave his team and try to get through the team, If he fails he must join them.
